text: Rahimuddin Khan (21 July 1926 â€“ 22 August 2022) was a general of the Pakistan Army and politician. He was the 4th Chairman Joint Chiefs of Staff Committee from 1984 to 1987. He also was the 7th Governor of Balochistan from 1978 to 1984. He also was the 16th Governor of Sindh in 1988. Khan was born in Qaimganj, then-British India. Khan died on 22 August 2022 in Lahore, Pakistan at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Pakistani generals Category:Politicians from Balochistan (Pakistan) Category:Politicians from Sindh
title: Rahimuddin Khan
